title: Kwinana Beach warehouse sells for $3.05m
text:
Clayton Road Investments has sold a Smithfield warehouse for $5.05 million.

The sale of the 1650-square-metre property represents $3060 per square metre and a 4.99 per cent yield. The property brings in annual net rent of $252,000.

The off-the-market sale of 45 Sturt Street was negotiated by CBRE’s Elijah Shakir and John Tsoutsa.

Double achievement

Basa Constructions has sold two industrial sites in Truganina, Melbourne, off the plan.

Aries Rail bought 52 Paraweena Drive for $1.1 million and a private investor paid $1 million for 54 Paraweena Drive.

CBRE’s Lachlan May and Fergus Pragnell were in charge of the sales.

Basa Constructions sold the twin properties off-the-plan. Supplied

Advertisement

Early bird special

A developer has bought a mixed-use site in Bayswater, Melbourne, for $3.91 million before expressions of interest closed.

The corner block at 705 Mountain Highway is occupied by a retailer with annual returns of $185,000.

The deal was brokered by Ray White's Mitch Rosam and Paul Waterhouse.

This Bayswater mixed-use site was snapped up for $3.91 million before expressions of interest closed. Supplied

Bayswater buy

Also in Bayswater, a national retailer has bought an industrial property for $1.1 million at 10 Scoresby Road.

The 550-square-metre site offers a 400-square-metre warehouse and 150-square-metre office with roller door access and proximity to arterial roads and public transport.

Advertisement

CVA's Jarrod Moran and Stan Dawidowski handled the sale.

Off to the races

A multi-tenanted retail and commercial property at at 99 Racecourse Road, Brisbane, has sold for $3.1 million.

A private investor bought the 691-square-metre property, which has anchor tenant NAB as well as medical and office tenants and a one year weighted average lease expiry.

JLL's Andrew Havig and Campbell Bowers closed the deal.

Shopping spree

A private investor has paid $1.65 million for a two-storey shop and office building on the Studfield shopping strip in Wantirna South, Melbourne.

The property has a blended yield of 4.6 per cent.

Advertisement

Fitzroys' Jordan Ceppi and Chris Kombi negotiated the sale.

No kidding

An 850-square-metre commercial property leased to a childcare centre in Chirnside Park, Melbourne has sold for $1.7 million.

The property at 9/286-288 Maroondah Highway has a 7 per cent yield.

Ace Space Children’s Play Centre renewed a five-year lease in March, paying rent of $118,014 per annum with 3 per cent fixed annual increases.

Cushman & Wakefield’s Robert Colaneri and Jordie Cassidy organised the deal.

Industrious Ingleburn

D &P Waters Property Holdings has sold a 2000-square-metre industrial property, 8 Shaw Road, Ingleburn, Sydney, to owner-occupier FOY SPT for $1.65 million.

Colliers International's Adrian Balderston sold the property.

Submissions to stan@afr.com
description: A warehouse in Smithfield also sold off-market for $5.05 million.
